RuleSet.Name: src/schema/jpa/SchemaJpaTableDefaultFactory.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA Default Factory implementation for $TableName$

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaJpaTableDefaultFactoryJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasSuperClassRelation no implJpaNewPKey default empty$$switch HasSuperClassRelation no maybeImplJpaNewHPKey default empty$$iterate Index( each implJpaNewNonPrimaryIndexKey )$$implJpaNewRec$$switch BaseHasHistory yes implJpaNewHRec default empty$
